name: Caught Between - LD30
description:
A/D or arrow keys- Left/Right

W or arrow keys - Jump

Space- Shoot

stomp on small enemies, shoot big ones

UPDATED VERSION WITH CHECKPOINTS: http://rooter4.itch.io/caught-between---ld30-v11
